-- Shortcut handling
1 online task
start online screen after validation
start new debtor after validation and new debtor is pressed
-- Fixed text for trade categories 1 until 3
... Variables uses for validations and error handling
DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT has been set to 1 or 2
DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT has been set to 3
-- set trigger if ODH001 is called from e.g. ODHC01GR (Graydon serach screen)
and button Copy is pressed
init TEMP file
.. set TRUE, to achive always the check if a new debtor has to be directly
deleted if Cancel is pressed
call online task
LEAVE TASK
save entry
-- Save changes
-- if a DHIC row is present with DHIC_DEBH = DEBH_DEBH and DHIC_INFS_CODE = SN
-- Ask to discard changes for changes on existing debtros
-- Ask to skip final storing of the new debtor
delete new debtor (see calling program)
-- Handler is called if a country is changed to an UHRC country
-- there is a DHIC rows with DHIC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DHIC_INFS_CODE = ST
-- there is a DHIC rows with DHIC_INFS_CODE='SN'
first commercial owner
... Liquidator
read DEBTOR_HELLER to compare changes
look, if at least one record exist
-- Check for copied data (from e.g. Graydon search result screen ODHC01GR)
-- Validations
... changes on legal owner / check creditlimits
//07-05-2003 JP SCR #3467 submitter note: add update on var if changes
//if cancel was pressed in ODH001B stop all updates and changes

ExpSyntax.val: ViewMod (0) AND Level (0)='RM' AND NOT ({0,2}) OR {3,1} AND NOT ({0,2})

Text.val: //test in DEBC for DEBTOR_HELLER to delete
//test in DEBC_DEBHGROUP for DEBTOR_HELLER to delete
//test in LEGALOWNER for DEBTOR_HELLER to delete
//test in COMM1OWNER for DEBTOR_HELLER to delete
//test in COMM2OWNER for DEBTOR_HELLER to delete
CREATE NEW DEBTOR
exit program
run User Action to Exit ODH
DELETE DEBTOR
//at least one record in DEBC
//at least one owner exist
Check that only one record is returned
//at least one buying group
//at least one BANK_LEDG_No
confirm delete
delete answer = 'Y'
exit program
run User Action to Exit ODH
LZB Text
-- Reverse factoring
-- Ratings
ALL OTHER CASES
all other cases
exit program
run User Action to Exit ODH by pressing "Exit"
run User Action to Exit ODH by pressing onwer button

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/debh where DEBH_DATDELETED is null :2

Text.val: -- No ID number available
-- No emailaddress
-- No ID number available
... current row is directly deleted (see task properties)

Text.valUnicode: This client number is already present for the next debtors

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(debh_totacreditlimsupplied) as decimal(11,0)) from :1/debh where debh_commercialowner_debh1 = :2 or debh_commercialowner_debh2 = :2 for read only

Text.val: -- Reset triggers
-- DEBH_HADR_NAME1 is mandatory
-- DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS is mandatory
-- DEBH_LANGUAGE is mandatory and must be valid
-- DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY is mandatory and must be valid
-- Country not allowed for debtors
... in case of changes in country:
1. BDH002 has to be called to perform changes to other tables (see save module
of ODH001
2. ODH001UHRC has to be called to book off invoices if new country is a UHRC
(see save module of ODH001)
-- If there exists debtor clients where no CLIENT_COUNTRY rows exists for the
new country, country changes are not allowed
-- If changing the country to an UHRC, possible outstanding invoices must be
booked off
-- DEBH_HADR_CITY is mandatory
-- DEBH_HADR_ZIP in case of address changes and ... the zipcode has to be
extracted from DEBH_HADR_CITY
... in case of zipcode changes the zipcodes of all related debtor client has to
be changed (see save module of ODH001)
-- DEBH_HADR_ZIP is mandatory
-- DEBH_EMAIL must be validated
-- If at least one postal address field is entered all other postal address
fields are mandatory and must be valid
... DEBH_PADR_ADDRESS entered
... DEBH_PADR_CITY entered
... DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY entered
... DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY not allowed for debtors
... in case of changes in country:
ODH001UHRC has to be called to book off invoices if new country is a UHRC
(see save module of ODH001)
... DEBH_PADR_ZIP in case of address changes and ... the zipcode has to be
extracted from DEBH_PADR_CITY
... DEBH_PADR_ZIP is mandatory
-- Set zipcode = blank if all postal address fields are removed by users, field
is not available on screen,
.. also if country is changed and CTRY_ZIPCODEAFTERCITY ='N'(no zipcode
extraction required)
-- DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH
... new legal owner is not valid
... new legal owner is not main office
... legal owner cannot be removed / still affiliates connected
... legal owner not allowed / already commercial owner
... reinsurance codes not allowed on new affiliates
... percentage legal owner must be <= 100
-- Validate national registration numbers
... test if all debtors have the same main reference number
... test if main reference number already exists
... in case of same reference number already exists, ask users how to handle
... no connection
... allow connection (MQ183 has to be added)
... copy tradecategory from owner to new affiliate
@ see DB_WhereClause: detor heller has to be selected for entered new legal
owner; Test on DEBH_NO and DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = new legal owner
because it' possible that the legal owner of the current debtor is not already
a real owner because DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH is stored in the further modules
-- Check DHIC for current handled debtor heller
(will be not selected in DEBH selection, because the new entered legal owner
is not finaly stored to current handled debtor heller)
-- Check DHIC for all other debtors regarding to the new entered legal owner

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE, DHIC.DHIC_ID, DHIC.DHIC_DEBH from :1/DHIC DHIC, :1/DEBH DEBH where DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBH.DEBH_NO and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = ':2' and DHIC.DHIC_DEBH <> :3 and DEBH.DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3 and :4 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1
... new commercial owner 1 is not valid
... percentage commercial owner 1 must be <= 100
... DEBH_LEGALFORM must be valid
... DEBH_LIIQUIDATOR not valid
... DEBH_BANKID not valid
... DEBH_TRADE_CATEGORY1 is mandatory and must be valid
... DEBH_TRADE_CATEGORY2 must be valid
... DEBH_TRADE_CATEGORY3 must be valid
... DEBH_CLNT_ADMNO/CLNTNO must be valid
